item.title: Xbox - Project Scorpio
item.description:
Xbox - Project Scorpio

The most powerful console ever. Holiday 2017.

item.title: Xbox One S
item.description:
Xbox One S

Introducing the new Xbox One S. Play the greatest games lineup, including Xbox 360 classics, on a 40% smaller console. Experience richer, more luminous colors in games and video with High Dynamic Range technology. Stream 4K video on Netflix and Amazon Video, and watch UHD Blu-rayâ„¢ movies in stunning 4K Ultra HD.

item.title: Xbox Play Anywhere - Anywhere is a great place to play
item.description:
Xbox Play Anywhere - Anywhere is a great place to play

Experience the freedom to play your games wherever you want. Now when you own an Xbox Play Anywhere title, it's yours to play on both Xbox One and Windows 10 PC at no additional cost. www.xbox.com/xbox-play-anywhere

item.title: Xbox One - E3 2016 Games Montage
item.description:
Xbox One - E3 2016 Games Montage

Play the greatest games lineup on Xbox One. With all the biggest blockbusters this year, and a growing library of Xbox 360 classics, there's never been a better time to jump ahead.

item.title: Xbox Elite Wireless Controller - Gears of War 4 Limited Edition
item.description:
Xbox Elite Wireless Controller - Gears of War 4 Limited Edition

Crush the competition with the Xbox Elite Wireless Controller - Gears of War 4 Limited Edition, featuring a gritty, battle-weathered design, an arsenal of swappable components, Hair Trigger Locks, an exclusive in-game item, and three Gear Packs. *Xbox Accessories app features, including mapping buttons and saving profiles, are available only on Xbox One and Windows 10.

item.title: See what's new from ID@Xbox E3 2016
item.description:
See what's new from ID@Xbox E3 2016

See what's new from ID@Xbox E32016 - Risk takers, rule breakers, and game changers. Xbox is home to the best, most creative and innovative games coming from Independent gamers.

item.title: Xbox Design Lab - Xbox Wireless Controller
item.description:
Xbox Design Lab - Xbox Wireless Controller

Now you can personalize your very own Xbox Wireless Controller with Xbox Design Lab. Start from scratch or customize an existing design online, choosing from a wide range of color combinations. You can even add laser engraving for a more personal touch. You design it. We build it.

item.title: Battlefield 1 E3 2016 Xbox Briefing
item.description:
Battlefield 1 E3 2016 Xbox Briefing

You look into the distance and see planes torn apart by gunfire, their debris raining down over London. In war-torn France to the east, horrible armored tanks tear holes in walls as they roll through crumbling cities.

item.title: Halo Wars 2 E3 Multiplayer Beta Trailer
item.description:
Halo Wars 2 E3 Multiplayer Beta Trailer

Halo Wars 2 E3 Multiplayer Beta Trailer - 343 Industries and Creative Assembly bring you the explosive return of real-time strategy to the Halo universe in Halo Wars 2. Build and command powerful armies of vehicles and troops in epic battles on the biggest Halo battlefield ever.

item.title: Announcing State of Decay 2 - Xbox E3 2016
item.description:
Announcing State of Decay 2 - Xbox E3 2016

STATE OF DECAY 2 E3 ANNOUNCE TRAILER. The next installment in the critically acclaimed "State of Decay" franchise immerses you in an all-new, multiplayer zombie survival fantasy. Build a lasting community, working with other players or solo to overcome challenges while exploring your own unique story in a world that remembers the choices you make.
